Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Santorini (Perivolos), Perivolos Sandy Resort is convenient to Perivolos Beach and Waterpark Santorini. This hotel is within close proximity of Perissa Beach and Museum of Minerals and Fossils.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 48 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators. Rooms have private balconies. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks, housekeeping is provided daily, and irons/ironing boards can be requested.

Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
